name: A Walk Through Time
description:
This game takes place in a futuristic museum where you are a security guard who is faced with having to reset it's AI Super Security System when it gets hit with a technical glitch due to a storm.

You must find and scan the appropriate artifacts from different time periods in order for the AI to calibrate correctly!

Developed by Daniel (Audhumbla) Thorne and Nathan (Daeuiot) Mangan for the GameDev.tv Game Jam

A continual thanks to all the people who  play, test, and give feedback! ^.^

Source (since it out grew the limit) - https://drive.google.com/file/d/1w8PgbkCINVF-sGUf9e-j5e5j3ados47-/view?usp=shari...
